definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :2Sa 18:8 wood, forest, thicket (MI:21 pl. [[היערן]] (= n.pr.loc. ?); Ph. [[יער]] and [[יר]], cf. DHM in MV:(10) 983; Aram. [[יַעֲרָא]], ya9ro0 wood, thicket; As. âru Dl:HWB 230, cf. Jäger:BAS i, 476)—abs. [[ ַ֫יעַר]] Is 7:2 +; [[יׇ֑עַר]] Mic 3:12 +; c. [[ה]] loc. [[יַעֲרָה]] Jos 17:15; cstr. [[ ַ֫יעַר]] 2Sa 18:6; [[יַעְרָהּ]] Je 46:23, etc.; pl. [[יְעָרִים]] Ezr 2:25 + 4 t. (incl. Ez Eze 34:25 Qr, so Co); [[יְעָרוֹת]] Ps 29:9; —

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: wood, forest, wooded height, with trees to be felled Jos 17:15 (c. [[עלה]] go up to), v:Jos 17:18 (J), De 19:5 (not elsewhere Hex); [[עֵץ מִיַּעַר כְּרָתוֹ]] Je 10:13 as wood out of a forest he hath cut it; [[יחטבו מן־היערים]] Ez Eze 39:10 ([[עחים מן־השׂדה]] in ‖ cl.); as producing trees [[יער חוֹמֵחַ עֵחִים]] Ec 2:6; in designation of Solomon's palace [[בֵּעַר הַלְּבָנוֹן]] 1Ki 7:2 (on structure of this house v. Sta:Salomos Bauten, ZAW 1883, 150), 1Ki 10:17, 1Ki 10:21 = 2Ch 9:16, 2Ch 9:20; cf. [[בֵּית הַיׇּ֫עַר]] Is 22:8; fig. of foes to be cut down and destroyed [[נִקַּף סִבְכֵי]] [[היער]] Is 10:34; [[כָּֽרְתוּ יַעְרָהּ]] Je 46:23; so Is 32:19 and [[יער הַבָּחִו֠ר]] Zec 11:2 (rd. Kt [[הַבָּחוּר]] inaccessible forest).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: as hiding-place for fugitive 1Sa 22:5; lurking-place of wild beasts Am 3:4, Mic 5:7, 2Ki 2:24, Je 5:6, Je 12:8, Is 56:9, Ps 50:10, Ps 80:14, Ps 104:20, cf. Ez Eze 34:25 (rd. Qr, v. supr.)

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: stripped by voice of ´[[י]] Ps 29:9; devoured by fire Is 9:17 (´[[סִבְכֵי הַיּ]]; fig. of the people); so in metaph. or sim. of ´[[י]]'s judgements Is 10:18 ([[כְּבוֹד יַעְרוֹ]], fig. of Assyr.), Je 21:14, Ez Eze 21:2, Eze 21:3 (v.infr.) Ps 83:15.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: opp. [[כַּרְמֶל]] (garden-land) Is 29:17, Is 32:15; but also [[יַעַר כַּרְמִלּוֹ]] his garden woodland 2Ki 19:23 = Is 37:24, and [[יַעַר בְּתוֹךְ כַּרְמֶל]] Mic 7:14 (secluded and fertile abode for flock, fig. of people, v. Che; Hi-St thinks of sacred grove).

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: = thicket, esp. as symbol of desolation Ho 2:14; [[בָּמוֹת יער]] thicket-covered heights (overgrown with bushes and trees) Mic 3:12 = Je 26:18; also [[בַּיַּעַר בּעֲרַב]] Is 21:13 in the thicket (or bushes, so VB) in Arabia must ye lodge, caravans of Dedanites.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: [[יער]]([[ה]])[[עֲחֵי ]] trees of the forest Is 7:2 (in sim), Is 10:19 ([[יַעְרוֹ שְׁאָר עֵץ]], fig.), Is 44:14, Ez Eze 15:2, also v:Eze 15:6 ([[עֵץ היער]]), Ct So 2:3 (in sim.); fig., as singing before ´[[י]] Ps 96:12 = 1Ch 16:33, Is Is 44:23 ([[יער וְכָל־עֵץ בּוֹ]]).

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: particular forests are: [[יער אפרים]] 2Sa 18:6, see [[אֶפְרַיִם]] p. 68 supr.; cf. v:2Sa 18:18, v:2Sa 18:17 (v. also Jos 17:15, Jos 17:18); [[יַעַר חָָרֶת]] 1Sa 22:5 (v. supr.); [[יַעַר לְבָנוֹן]] (v. supr.); [[יַעַר הַשָּׂדֶה נֶגֶב]] and [[יַעַר הַנׇּגֶב]] Ez Eze 21:2, Eze 21:3 (v. supr.) fig. of Judah (land and people); v. also [[יְעָרִים]] infr.—[[שְׂדֵי־ ׇ֑יעַר]] Ps 132:6 is a n.pr.loc. (but Bae thinks appellat. ‘auf waldigem Gefilcle’ ), v. [[קִרְיַת יְעָרִים]]. On 1Sa 14:25, 1Sa 14:26, v. II. [[יער]].—[[יעורים]] Ez Eze 34:25 Kt, rd. [[יְעָרִים]] Qr, v. supr.
